title: White Horse
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Charles Demuth [1883-1935], Lancaster, PA until 1935; by inheritance to Robert Locher [1888-1956], New York, NY and Lancaster, PA, 1935; (Richard Weyand, Lancaster, PA, 1946?); Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. [1898-1993] James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, 1951 until February 14, 1987; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones), Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994.

Notes:
[1]. See "The Beal Collection of American Art," Carnegie Museum of Art, 1994, p. 81.

Updated and under on-going review by CGK.
